snippet: Saturday will mark the first time that two quarterbacks who threw for over 5,000 yards in a season, the Saints’ Drew Brees and the Lions’ Matthew Stafford, will face each other.
abstract: Saturday will mark the first time that two quarterbacks who threw for over 5,000 yards in a season, the Saints’ Drew Brees and the Lions’ Matthew Stafford, will face each other.

headline.main: Playoff Matchups: A Lot of Offense, a Little Defense
headline.print_headline: Defenses Give Edge to the Giants and the Steelers
